content: Austin, I think you’re overdoing the partisanship here with your certainty that there’s nothing regarding Russia. And I’d say the same thing to anyone who expressed certainty that there is something. What we know is the Director of the FBI testified under oath to Congress that the Bureau is investigating the possibility of collusion between the Trump campaign and Russia. Congressional committees are looking into that and related issues as well. All of that is highly unusual. Until the investigations are complete, certainty about their results is unwarranted.
